original_text: “‘Do not have sexual relations with your sister, either your father’s daughter or your mother’s daughter, whether she was born in the same home or elsewhere.
korean_text: 너는 네 자매 곧 네 아버지의 딸이나 네 어머니의 딸이나 집에서나 다른 곳에서 출생하였음을 막론하고 그들의 하체를 범하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: Do not have sexual relations with your sister
sentences.korean_translation: 너의 누이와 성적 관계를 맺지 말라

sentences.original_text: whether she was born in the same home
